lore: §7Monsters you kill using this item will drop their
§7soul. You can click on their souls on the
§7ground using this item to absorb them and
§7then spawn them to fight by your side.
§7Mana cost is based on the power of the
§7monsters that you summon. Shift right-click to
§7view and remove souls from this item. If your
